review: Great but you can't use it for YouTube. For watching a movie the remote is great. I hop they add YouTube.
author: arthur c porter

review: This is a great deal. I already had Prime. Just take time to read about all you get with Fire TV Stick and Prime. Too much to list here. It works great with movies and tv shows and if you like you can download app for a tablet or phone to control the stick instead of using the remote that comes with it. Then you can use voice controls to find what you want.
author: Miguel

review: When it works it's great. Unfortunately very frequently I turn on my TV and I'm told the Fire Stick can't connect to the Internet. I have to unplug it and wait until it reboots. I just don't like having to climb behind furniture to unplug and then wait. I use the extension and the stick is less than 5 feet from the wireless router.
author: Colleen O. Kelly

review: The fire stick offers a good selection of movies and TV. It is very easy to use.
author: Jim R.

review: Easy to set up and use. Very happy with this device.
author: P. Spath

review: Love it.  Received it quickly, set it up fast, works great.  Amazing for the price
author: Gail Paulus

review: I love the fire stick. It works great and was easy to install and use.
author: Brittany Bland

review: The Fire TV stick streams movies without any problems which is more than I could say for my "smart" TV.  I've used this on both a newer smart TV and a older TV without HDMI inputs.  For the older TV, I bought a $15 HDMI adaptor from Amazon.
author: Dennis D.
